The gas limit prevents smart contracts from consuming all your Ethereum. We will try to calculate the gas limit automatically for you, but some smart contracts may require a custom gas limit. Privacy Policy Terms of Service privacyPolicy.html termsOfService.html tokenscript_explaination.html 24 hours Appreciation %1$s/Ticket Ethereum Ethereum Blockchain Issuer: DEVICE SECURITY COMPROMISED Your phone is rooted but the keys are still protected by Android secure enclave encryption. The attack vector would be from a keyboard app or clipboard viewer learning your key when you enter it. AlphaWallet does its best to mitigate this risk by switching off keyboard auto-suggest. If you run root, recommend you only use mainstream keyboard apps, run a good quality anti-virus app and use a respected open source root manager such as Magisk or SuperSU to limit access to root privileges. Ultimately key safety is your responsibility. Still need help? Contact us Confirm Sale? DD/MM/YYYY Before the link expires, anyone with the MagicLink can purchase your tickets with one click. Important 0.00 ETH Thay đổi ví Facebook Twitter ERC 20 ERC 875 ERC 875* Ethereum is an open-source, public, blockchain-based distributed computing platform and operating system featuring smart contract (scripting) functionality. It is the infrastructure for blockchain products and services.\n\nETH/Ether is a cryptocurrency whose blockchain is generated by the Ethereum platform. Ether can be transferred between accounts and used to compensate participant mining nodes for computations performed. Ethereum provides a decentralised Turing-complete virtual machine, the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), which can execute scripts using an international network of public nodes. "Gas", an internal transaction pricing mechanism, is used to mitigate spam and allocate resources on the network. Currently, Ethereum is the best and largest blockchain for developing smart contract application and services. AlphaWallet starts with supporting Ethereum blockchain and helps improving its technology. You can convert Ethereum to fiat money and transfer it to your bank account through any cryptocurrency exchange. You can provide your wallet address to the sender. They can transfer ETH to you with your wallet address. SAO LƯU VÍ %1$s → Authentication Cancelled Authentication Failed Sao lưu ví của bạn bằng cụm từ bí mật Tạo một bản sao lưu rất đơn giản và an toàn: chỉ cần viết ra 12 từ và giữ chúng ở nơi bí mật, ngoại tuyến. Sao lưu ví của tôi Viết ra cụm từ bí mật không phải trên giấy OK, tôi đã viết cụm từ này Xác minh cụm từ Tiếp tục Cụm từ khôi phục không hợp lệ. Vui lòng kiểm tra và thử lại. Quản lý Ví Hiển thị cụm từ bí mật Mất ví này If you lose access to this device, your funds will be lost, unless you back up! Be careful with deleting your wallet. If you have not backed up your wallet, you might lose all your funds. Xuất ra Keystore JSON Keystore JSON là gì? Keystore là một tệp văn bản. Bạn có thể sao chép nội dung và lưu trữ nó khi bạn muốn nhập ví của mình. Kiểm tra cụm từ bí mật của tôi Making backup is very simple and safe just write down %1$s words and keep them in a safe place, offline. A KeyStore is a text file. You can copy its content and place when you want to import your wallet. This is a safe way to back up a wallet. Cài đặt mật khẩu cho Keystore NOTE: You must remember your password. We do not store your password elsewhere. KeyStore is always encrypted, otherwise whoever has it can gain the money. Lưu Keystore Không chia sẻ bản sao lưu của bạn. AlphaWallet các thành viên trong nhóm sẽ không yêu cầu nó. Nhập vào cụm từ bí mật If your seed phrase is not in English, please convert it to English on your own using tools like this https://iancoleman.io/bip39/ Cụm từ khôi phục không hợp lệ. Vui lòng kiểm tra và thử lại. NHẬP VÀO TỪ ICLOUD/DROPBOX/GOOGLE DRIVE Nhập khóa cá nhân NOTE: You must remember your password. We do not store your password elsewhere. KeyStore is always encrypted, otherwise whoever has it can gain the money. Private key is hex only: use a–f A–F and 0–9 Không có gì để chia sẻ Browse to a DApp to share it. Time to back up your Wallet We highly recommend to back up your wallet every month. Use Pin Chạm vào cảm biến vân tay Mở khóa cá nhân Thiết bị không an toàn Your device is not locked by Fingerprint, PIN or other Biometric. Cannot create a secured private key until the device has some protection. Nhắc tôi sau Thay đổi ví Legacy Wallets Đã hoãn sao lưu. Use PIN Nhận TokenScript Element Error Error in TokenScript element: %1$s function input \'%1$s\' not found in HTML elements. Invalid input value: %1$s VALUE LinkedIn Unable to create key. Try enabling security on your phone. A seed phrase, seed recovery phrase or backup seed phrase is a list of words which store all the information needed to recover a crypto wallet. Wallet software will typically generate a seed phrase and instruct the user to write it down on paper.
